Description

In this farming sim you can evolve crops and breed animals into magical variations and use magic to ease the hard farm work. Date citizens regardless of their gender or race, explore the world, craft potions, cook, fish, mine, customize your farm and change the land into a magical paradise.

History

Because we love farming games, fantasy and games with a deeper story, we decided to create our own farming game with a magical fantasy-setting and our own characters. The planning of the project started in November 2021. It's planned to finish programming the base features in early 2023 and focussing on art and content during 2023.

Features

  • Live in a farm in a magical world and evolve crops to higher forms, breed magical animals, go fishing, craft potions and more!
  • Play as one of 5 Races and customize your character based on their style!
  • Fall in love with one of the 10 dateable residents and start a family - if you want!
  • Customize your farm with the advanced decoration system!
